Parameters.Name: RECORDING-5-1-19 RECORDING CONTROL – JOB STATE CHANGE EVENT

Test.TestName: RECORDING-5-1-19 Features detection
Test.Name: GetServices and Digest suported
Test.Description: GetServices - supported. Digest - supported.

Test.TestName: RECORDING-5-1-19 RECORDING CONTROL – JOB STATE CHANGE EVENT
Test.Name: Correct response: one recording job
Test.Description: Check RECORDING-5-1-19 RECORDING CONTROL – JOB STATE CHANGE EVENT test when DUT sends correct response with one recording job

Test.TestName: RECORDING-5-1-19 RECORDING CONTROL – JOB STATE CHANGE EVENT
Test.Name: Correct response: several recording jobs
Test.Description: Check RECORDING-5-1-19 RECORDING CONTROL – JOB STATE CHANGE EVENT test when DUT sends correct response with several recording jobs

Test.TestName: RECORDING-5-1-19 RECORDING CONTROL – JOB STATE CHANGE EVENT
Test.Name: Not unique recording job tokens
Test.Description: Check RECORDING-5-1-19 RECORDING CONTROL – JOB STATE CHANGE EVENT test when DUT sends incorrect response with equal recording jobs tokens

Test.TestName: RECORDING-5-1-19 RECORDING CONTROL – JOB STATE CHANGE EVENT
Test.Name: No response on GetRecordingJobs
Test.Description: Check RECORDING-5-1-19 RECORDING CONTROL – JOB STATE CHANGE EVENT test when DUT sends no response on GetRecordingJobs

Test.TestName: RECORDING-5-1-19 RECORDING CONTROL – JOB STATE CHANGE EVENT
Test.Name: Fault on GetRecordingJobs
Test.Description: Check RECORDING-5-1-19 RECORDING CONTROL – JOB STATE CHANGE EVENT test when DUT sends fault on GetRecordingJobs

ExpectedResult.TestSummary:
RECORDING-5-1-19 RECORDING CONTROL – JOB STATE CHANGE EVENT
STEP 1 - Get Recording Control service address Transmit done Receive done http://localhost:19266/onvif/ServiceRecording10/RecordingService.asmx STEP PASSED
STEP 2 - Check that the DUT returned Recording Control service address STEP PASSED
STEP 3 - Check that Recording service is accessible STEP PASSED
STEP 4 - Get Recording Jobs Transmit done Receive done SOAP fault returned Code: Receiver Subcode: ActionNotSupported Subcode: NoSuchService Reason: System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException: MESSAGE at DUT.CameraWebService.Base.BaseDutService.StepTypeProcessing(StepType stepType, SoapException ex, Int32 timeOut) in D:\ONVIF\DUT\CameraWebService\Base\BaseDutService.cs:line 46 at DUT.CameraWebService.Base.BaseDutService.ExecuteGetCommand(ParametersValidation validationRequest, GetMethodDelegate method) in D:\ONVIF\DUT\CameraWebService\Base\BaseDutService.cs:line 68 at DUT.CameraWebService.Recording10.RecordingService.GetRecordingJobs() in D:\ONVIF\DUT\CameraWebService\ServiceRecording10\RecordingService.asmx.cs:line 176 STEP FAILED
TEST FAILED

Test.Name: Fault on GetRecordings response
Test.Description: Check RECORDING-5-1-19 RECORDING CONTROL – JOB STATE CHANGE EVENT test when DUT sends fault message on GetRecordings response

Test.Name: Incorrect notification: Wrong Topic
Test.Description: Check RECORDING-5-1-19 RECORDING CONTROL – JOB STATE CHANGE EVENT test when DUT sends Notification with wrong Topic

ExpectedResult.TestSummary:
RECORDING-5-1-19 RECORDING CONTROL – JOB STATE CHANGE EVENT
STEP 1 - Get Recording Control service address Transmit done Receive done http://localhost:17934/ServiceRecording10/RecordingService.asmx STEP PASSED
STEP 2 - Check that the DUT returned Recording Control service address STEP PASSED
STEP 3 - Check that Recording service is accessible STEP PASSED
STEP 4 - Get Recording Jobs Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 5 - Check that all recording jobs have unique job token STEP PASSED
STEP 6 - Get Event service address Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 7 - Create Pull Point Subsciption Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 8 - Check that TerminationTime is specified STEP PASSED
STEP 9 - Validate CurrentTime and TerminationTime STEP PASSED
STEP 10 - Check if the DUT returned SubscriptionReference STEP PASSED
STEP 11 - Check if SubscriptionReference contains address STEP PASSED
STEP 12 - Check that URL specified is valid STEP PASSED
STEP 13 - Send PullMessages request Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 14 - Validate CurrentTime and TerminationTime STEP PASSED
STEP 15 - Check that a maximum number of 2 Notification Messages is included in PullMessagesResponse STEP PASSED
STEP 16 - Response is not empty STEP PASSED
STEP 17 - Checking that all required notifications are received STEP PASSED
STEP 18 - Set Recording Job Mode (jobToken = 'JobToken1') to 'Active' Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 19 - Send PullMessages request Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 20 - Validate CurrentTime and TerminationTime STEP PASSED
STEP 21 - Check that a maximum number of 2 Notification Messages is included in PullMessagesResponse STEP PASSED
STEP 22 - Response is not empty STEP PASSED
STEP 23 - Checking that all required notifications are received STEP PASSED
STEP 24 - Validate messages Message with UTC time = 2012-12-01T07:18:40.321 is incorrect:
Invalid topic.
Expected: tns1:RecordingConfig/JobState, where
xmlns:tns1=http://www.onvif.org/ver10/topics
Actual: tns1:RecordingConfig/JobChangeState, where
xmlns:tns1=http://www.onvif.org/ver10/topics STEP FAILED
STEP 25 - Send Unsubscribe request Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 26 - Set Recording Job Mode (jobToken = 'JobToken1') to 'Idle' Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
TEST FAILED
